statement.p: In 56.67 of the last 30 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{30}}={0.5667}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{30}. \displaystyle{P}={0.5667}\cdot{30}={17.001}. This is the number of days that it rained. We want the non-rainy days which is 30-17.001=12.999 We round that as requested to 13.
